module.header:
<style>

.message-blue {
position: relative;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    padding: 0px 10px 15px 5px;
    background-color: #A8DDFD;
    width: 300px;    
    height: auto;
    text-align: left;
    font: 400 1em 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    border: 1px solid #97C6E3;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

.message-grey {
    position: relative;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    margin-left: calc(100% - 330px);
    padding: 5px 10px 15px 5px;
    background-color: #dedede;
    width: 300px;
    height: auto;
    text-align: left;
    font: 400 1em 'Open Sans', sans-serif;
    border: 1px solid #dedede;
    border-radius: 10px;
}

.message-content {
    padding: 5px;
    margin: 0;
    line-height: 20px;
    font-size: .9em;
}

.message-name-right {
    position: absolute;
    font-size: .85em;
    font-weight: 300;
    bottom: 16px;
    right: 10px;
    letter-spacing: .1em;
    padding-top: 10px;
}

.message-timestamp-right {
    position: absolute;
    font-size: .85em;
    font-weight: 300;
    bottom: 2px;
    right: 10px;
    letter-spacing: .02em;
}

.message-name-left{
    position: absolute;
    font-size: .85em;
    font-weight: 300;
    bottom: 16px;
    left: 10px;
    letter-spacing: .1em;
    padding-top: 10px;
}

.message-timestamp-left {
    position: absolute;
    font-size: .85em;
    font-weight: 300;
    bottom: 2px;
    left: 10px;
    letter-spacing: .02em;
}

.message-blue:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-top: 15px solid #A8DDFD;
    border-left: 15px solid transparent;
    border-right: 15px solid transparent;
    top: 0;
    left: -15px;
}

.message-blue:before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-top: 17px solid #97C6E3;
    border-left: 16px solid transparent;
    border-right: 16px solid transparent;
    top: -1px;
    left: -17px;
}

.message-grey:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-bottom: 15px solid #dedede;
    border-left: 15px solid transparent;
    border-right: 15px solid transparent;
    bottom: 0;
    right: -15px;
}

.message-grey:before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-bottom: 17px solid #dedede;
    border-left: 16px solid transparent;
    border-right: 16px solid transparent;
    bottom: -1px;
    right: -17px;
}

.bstrap30 .input-group[class*=col-] {
 
 //   max-width: 30%;
  //  margin-top: 25px;
 //   margin-left: 520px;
}

.btnReport {
//    margin: -60px 20px 0px 0px!important;
    
}

thead.ng-scope {
//    font-size: 125%!important;
    color: steelblue!important;
}

.bstrap30 .table-responsive {
    overflow: hidden!important;
}

.speech-wrapper{
  padding: 30px 40px;
 .bubbleBor{
    width: 300px;
    height: auto;
    display: block;
    background: #0023FF;
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 1px 3px 3px #5c5c5c;
   -webkit-box-shadow: 1px 3px 3px #5c5c5c;
    position: relative;
    margin: 0 0 25px;
    &.alt{
      margin: 0 0 0 60px;
      background-color:#E7E7E7;
      -webkit-box-shadow: 0 8px 6px -6px #5c5c5c;
	    box-shadow: 0 8px 6px -6px #5c5c5c;
    }
    .txt{
      padding: 8px 55px 8px 14px;
      .name{
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 12px;
        margin: 4px 0 10px 0;
        color: #f8f8f8;
        &.alt{
          color: #000;
          position: absolute;
          right: 10px;
          
        }
      }
      .messageBor{
        font-size: 12px;
        margin: 0;
        line-height: 18px;
        color: #f7f7f7;
      }
    .messageEnc{
        font-size: 12px;
        padding-top:7px;
        margin: 0;
        line-height: 18px;
        color: #000;
      }

      .timestampBor{
        font-size: 11px;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 8px;
        right: 10px;
        text-transform: uppercase; color: #f8f8f8
      }
      .timestampEnc{
        font-size: 11px;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 8px;
        right: 10px;
        text-transform: uppercase; color: #000
      }
    }   
   
 
    .bubble-arrow {
      position: absolute;
      width: 0;
      bottom:40px;
      left: -16px;
      height: 0;
      &.alt{
        right: -2px;      
        bottom: 40px;
        left: auto;
      }
    }
    .bubble-arrow:after {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      border: 0 solid transparent;
      border-top: 9px solid #0023FF;
      border-radius: 0 20px 0;
      width: 15px;
      height: 30px;
      transform: rotate(145deg);
    }
    .bubble-arrow.alt:after {
      transform: rotate(45deg) scaleY(-1);
      border-top: 9px solid #E7E7E7;
    }
  }
}

</style>
module.title: Text Messages Grid
